src:
Bankrådet straffade sig – aktien rasade 21 procent
Köprekommendationen var ett tappert försök att vara konstruktiv i en ratad sektor.  Det straffade sig med besked och norska nätbankens kursutveckling har varit usel. Men den underliggande verksamheten har inte alls utvecklats lika svagt som aktien antyder, och kunderna verkar älska banken.
04 Nov 2019, 09:46 by Di

text:
The Banking Board punished itself - the share plunged 21 percent
The purchase recommendation was a brave attempt to be constructive in a rated sector. This was punished with a message and the Norwegian net bank's price development has been lousy. But the underlying business has not developed as poorly as the share suggests, and customers seem to love the bank.
04 Nov 2019, 09:46 by Tue
